text: neohoe ijeon-e tteonan seonjodeul-ege iss-eossdeon geuleohan silyeon-eobs-i neohoe ga cheongug-e deul-eogalila saeng-gaghaneunyogeudeul-ege gotong-gwa yeoggyeong-gwa jeongsinjeog jintong-i iss-eoss-euni seonjija geuligo geubungwa hamkkehaessdeon mid-eum-i jinsilhan jadeuldo eonje hananim-ui seungliga o neunyago muddeola sillo hananim-ui seung lineun gakkai issnola
